alert.note: Alert for De Witt; Fayette; Gonzales; Karnes; Lavaca; Wilson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 05 at 7:14AM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of DeWitt, Karnes, Gonzales, Fayette, Lavaca and Wilson Counties through 815 AM CDT... At 713 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near La Grange to near Yoakum to Cestohowa. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cuero, Gonzales, Floresville, Yoakum, La Grange, Kenedy, Karnes City, Schulenburg, Hallettsville, Poth, Yorktown, Shiner, Stockdale, Flatonia, Moulton, Kosciusko, Nixon, Waelder, Runge, and Falls City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: De Witt; Fayette; Gonzales; Karnes; Lavaca; Wilson
